definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: The original user then decrypts the data with his private key.
sentences.chinese: 原来的用户，然后用他的解密私钥数据。

sentences.english: The underlying provider will take care of all necessary password hashing or decryption.
sentences.chinese: 底层的提供者会处理好必要的密码散列或解密。

sentences.english: The information sent to WikiLeaks falls into different categories.
sentences.chinese: 传到维基解密上的信息资料可分为几类。

sentences.english: WikiLeaks is the culmination of all these concepts.
sentences.chinese: 维基解密就是这些实现想法的高潮吧。

sentences.english: In this paper, a data encryption and decryption system-DEADS is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一个数据加密和解密体制DEADS。

sentences.english: An encrypted message cannot be decrypted by the destination queue manager.
sentences.chinese: 加密的消息不能由目标队列管理器解密。

sentences.english: Another major story was the activities of the WikiLeaks website.
sentences.chinese: 另一重大新闻是维基解密网的泄密活动。

sentences.english: That data can only be decrypted using the private key.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据只能使用私钥进行解密。

sentences.english: With steganalysis, the presence of data is only suspected, not confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 使用隐写式密码解密，数据的显示是不确定的。

sentences.english: Atomix is a puzzle game where you must join up a series of atoms to make certain molecules.
sentences.chinese: 是解密类游戏，你必须连接一些原子来构成某种分子。

sentences.english: Link collector will appear and it will automatically decrypt the links.
sentences.chinese: 连接管藏家将呈现，它会自动解密的关联。

sentences.english: The algorithm for encrypting images through sequences from linear congruence generator was described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了基于该线性同余随机序列的图像加解密算法。

sentences.english: This is another software that can be used to decrypt copy-protected DVD.
sentences.chinese: 这是另一个可以被用于解密受版权保护的DVD软件。

sentences.english: The whistle-blowing website Wikileaks is suspending its publication of classified files.
sentences.chinese: 揭秘网站‘维基解密’暂停发布保密文件。

sentences.english: After presenting the detailed encipher rule and decipher role, its characteristics is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了该方法加密和解密的具体实现规则。

sentences.english: The content can only be decrypted by an agent with the corresponding private key.
sentences.chinese: 只能由代理用相应的私钥解密该内容。

definition: to break a code/to crack a riddle/to solve an enigma/a breakthrough
to explore a mystery/to probe the unknown
to break (a bond, constraint etc)/to explain/to unravel/to decipher/to decode/to crack (software)
to expose/to unmask/to ferret out/to disclose/disclosure
to withhold information/to keep sth secret
painted eggshell/Easter egg/(media) Easter egg (hidden feature in software or a movie etc)/post-credits scene
the truth about sth/the actual facts
